#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n;
    size_t srch;
    cin>>n;
    string s,enzi;
    cin>>s;
    while(n--){
        cin>>enzi;
        srch=s.find(enzi);
        while(srch != string::npos){
            s.erase(srch,enzi.size());
            srch=s.find(enzi);
        }
    }
    if(s.size()==0)
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<s<<endl;
    return 0;
}
